content.text:
# Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Music Director

The Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Music Director is given by the state government as part of its annual Tamil Nadu State Film Awards for Tamil  (Tamil Movie Industry) feature films. Both Ilaiyaraaja and A. R. Rahman have won this award for a maximum of 6 times.
Superlatives
{|class="wikitable"
! Wins !! Recipient(s)
|-
| 6 || A R Rahman, Ilayaraja
|-
| 3 || M.S. Viswanathan, Deva, Harris Jayaraj
|-
| 2 || Yuvan Shankar Raja
|}
